#summary DHI -- Water & Environment
#labels Subject-Organization

[http://www.dhigroup.com/ Home page].

DHI owns the groundwater model [MikeShe MIKE SHE], with which Daisy can communicate through [OpenMI].  [Agrohydrology We] have been collaborating with DHI in many projects.  DHI also owns [DaisyGIS], a graphical user interface for Daisy that is particularly well suited for combination with GIS data.
